ahelkky1954973043320819907.content: My first project at OpenAI involved teaching our models to reason and use tools by improving their competitive programming skills. Back then, GPT-4 struggled with even the simplest Codeforces problems, often oom-ing in the sandbox. It's incredible to see that just 2.5 years
